***Device***
Name: OpenWeatherMap
ID: n001_weather
  ***Properties***
    NodeServer Online [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]
    Temperature [id=CLITEMP]
      Range -10 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Humidity [id=CLIHUM]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit Relative Humidity [uom id=22]
    Pressure [id=BARPRES]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit inches of Hg [uom id=23]
      Range 1000 to 2000 Unit Millibars [uom id=117]
      Range 1000 to 2000 Unit Hectopascals [uom id=118]
    Wind Direction [id=WINDDIR]
      Range 0 to 360 Unit Wind Direction Degrees [uom id=76]
        No Wind [0]
        East [90]
        South [180]
        West [270]
        North [360]
    High Temperature [id=GV0]
      Range -10 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Low Temperature [id=GV1]
      Range -10 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Wind Speed [id=GV4]
      Range 0 to 500 Unit mph [uom id=48]
      Range 0 to 500 Unit meters/sec [uom id=49]
    Rain Today [id=GV6]
      Range 0 to 10000 Unit Millimeter [uom id=82]
      Range 0 to 20000 Unit Inches [uom id=105]
    Climate Conditions [id=GV13]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        200
        overcast clouds [804]
    Cloud Conditions [id=GV14]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit Relative Humidity [uom id=22]
    Visibility [id=GV15]
      Range 0 to 10000 Unit Kilometer [uom id=83]
      Range 0 to 500 Unit Miles [uom id=116]
    UV Index [id=GV16]
      Range 0 to 15 Unit UV Index [uom id=71]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Re-Discover [id=DISCOVER]
    Remove Notices [id=REMOVE_NOTICES_ALL]
    Update Profile [id=UPDATE_PROFILE]

USER QUERY: Please dim the office controllers and then brighten them again.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "0 6D 74 4",
  "command_id": "DIM",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to dim the first office controller, so we use the DIM command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "0 6D 74 5",
  "command_id": "DIM",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to dim the second office controller, so we use the DIM command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "0 6D 74 4",
  "command_id": "BRT",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to brighten the first office controller after dimming, so we use the BRT command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "0 6D 74 5",
  "command_id": "BRT",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to brighten the second office controller after dimming, so we use the BRT command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
